title: What ever happened to the First Lady\'s White House Vegetable garden? Did the garden produce lots of vegetables for the First Family? Did the First Doughters work in the garden, or was a mini burocracy created to handle it?
text:
We're sorry but since we don't have reporters covering the White
House, we can't answer that question. We're a small community
newspaper and can answer your questions if they relate to life in
Southeastern North Carolina. Thanks,
